title: I've tried everything but LOL wont open
body:
When I click on it, it launches for about 5 minutes then closes. I check the Task Manager and its open however sometimes it wont be on Task Manager. 
I've tried reinstalling about 6 times  and I've also deleted the lol_launcher and lol_patcher folders, reset my laptop SO many times and it still doesn't work.
It's opened like twice in the past and that's about it. I don't know what's wrong with it. i've checked the compatibility and however many times I've re-installed I don't see a lol_air_client folder. 

When it does open, I try to update it and it says Unspecified Error over, and over and over. I know my wifi can mess up sometimes but I don't think that's the reason every single time. Even when I press repair, it says unspecified error, sometimes it's even crashed and made me send error reports. I have HexTech and tried to re-patch but I checked the logs and it always says Failed. 
Someone please help me with thorough instructions even if I have to uninstall and reinstall again just as long as it works. 

**Most Recent Log**: 1/16/2017 2:11 pm (idk if im doing this right lol)

replies.body:
When you notice issues during patching, do you notice they happen at a certain percentage during the patching process? I'd like you to try running league from the **lol.launcher.admin.exe** file as admin (right-click, *run as administrator*) to see if anything changes.

Let me know what you noticed.
**Update:** League ended up launching. I just started updating it :)
_If anyone else has the same problem please comment so this can be noticed by someone who knows an answer _
